tldr: Affected versions of this package unintentionally ignore the global `QuillEditorComponent` sanitation setting, causing HTML input to remain unsanitized.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a vulnerable version of the package and the global sanitation setting is set to `true`.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `ngx-quill` library to the patch version or set the property on component level.
